languages.text: "Вычищать ряды арбитров от тех, кто нетверд в служении Лекс Империалис. Совмещать расследования и дознания с местом в вашей свите не выйдет — если мы вернемся в Коронус, я покину флагман и займусь наведением порядка среди Арбитес".

"To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."
languages.original_text: "Вычищать ряды арбитров от тех, кто нетверд в служении Лекс Империалис. Совмещать расследования и дознания с местом в вашей свите не выйдет — если мы вернемся в Коронус, я покину флагман и займусь наведением порядка среди Арбитес".

traits.locale_text: "To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and inquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

"To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and inquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

"To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and inquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

"To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

"To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアへの忠誠を逸脱したアービトレイターたちを、その隊列から一掃する―そのために必要な調査と尋問を行うには、あなたの従者にとどまり続けるわけにはいきません。エクスパンスへ戻ったら、私は旗艦を離れ、高等裁定局に秩序を取り戻すための任務に就きます」
languages.original_text: "To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアへの忠誠を逸脱したアービトレイターたちを、その隊列から一掃する―そのために必要な調査と尋問を行うには、あなたの従者にとどまり続けるわけにはいきません。エクスパンスへ戻ったら、私は旗艦を離れ、高等裁定局に秩序を取り戻すための任務に就きます」

languages.text: "Ich werde die Reihen der Arbitratoren von jenen säubern, die ihren Dienst am Lex Imperia vernachlässigt haben. Die Durchführung der erforderlichen Untersuchungen und Recherchen wird mit meinem Bleiben in Eurem Gefolge nicht vereinbar sein – falls wir zur Ausdehnung zurückkehren, werde ich das Flaggschiff verlassen und mich der Wiederherstellung der Ordnung im Adeptus Arbites widmen."
languages.original_text: "To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die Reihen der Arbitratoren von jenen säubern, die ihren Dienst am Lex Imperia vernachlässigt haben. Die Durchführung der erforderlichen Untersuchungen und Recherchen wird mit meinem Bleiben in Eurem Gefolge nicht vereinbar sein – falls wir zur Ausdehnung zurückkehren, werde ich das Flaggschiff verlassen und mich der Wiederherstellung der Ordnung im Adeptus Arbites widmen."

languages.text: « Je compte purger les rangs des arbitrators afin d'écarter du pouvoir ceux qui ont oublié leurs responsabilités auprès de la Lex Imperialis. Les nombreuses recherches et procédures engendrées par cette mission ne me permettront pas de conserver mon rôle dans votre entourage. Si nous retournons dans les Étendues, je quitterai le vaisseau amiral afin de rétablir l'ordre au sein de l'Adeptus Arbites. »
languages.original_text: "To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: « Je compte purger les rangs des arbitrators afin d'écarter du pouvoir ceux qui ont oublié leurs responsabilités auprès de la Lex Imperialis. Les nombreuses recherches et procédures engendrées par cette mission ne me permettront pas de conserver mon rôle dans votre entourage. Si nous retournons dans les Étendues, je quitterai le vaisseau amiral afin de rétablir l'ordre au sein de l'Adeptus Arbites. »

languages.text: «Purgar a los Arbitrator que se hayan apartado del código impuesto por la Lex Imperialis. Llevar a cabo las investigaciones y pesquisas pertinentes será inviable mientras forme parte de su séquito; si volvemos a la Extensión, abandonaré la nave insignia y me dedicaré a restablecer el orden en el Adeptus Arbites».
languages.original_text: "To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: «Purgar a los Arbitrator que se hayan apartado del código impuesto por la Lex Imperialis. Llevar a cabo las investigaciones y pesquisas pertinentes será inviable mientras forme parte de su séquito; si volvemos a la Extensión, abandonaré la nave insignia y me dedicaré a restablecer el orden en el Adeptus Arbites».

languages.text: “我要清理法务官的队伍，消灭那些执行律法期间误入歧途的成员。若是要进行清查，恐怕我就没办法继续担任你的随行人员了。等我们回到科罗努斯扩区之后，我会离开你的旗舰，努力恢复法务部的秩序。”
languages.original_text: "To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: “我要清理法务官的队伍，消灭那些执行律法期间误入歧途的成员。若是要进行清查，恐怕我就没办法继续担任你的随行人员了。等我们回到科罗努斯扩区之后，我会离开你的旗舰，努力恢复法务部的秩序。”

languages.text: "Yargıcı saflarında olup Lex İmperialis'e hizmetlerinde yollarını şaşırmış olanları temizleyeceğim. Gerekli soruşturmaları ve tahkikatları yürütmek, maiyetindeki yerimi korumakla çatışacaktır. Enginlik'e dönersek sancak gemisini terk edip Adeptus Arbites'teki düzeni yeniden sağlamak için çalışacağım."
languages.original_text: "To purge the Arbitrators' ranks of those who have strayed in their service to the Lex Imperialis. Conducting the required investigations and enquiries will not be compatible with keeping my place in your retinue — if we return to the Expanse, I will leave the flagship and work to restore order in the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcı saflarından, Lex Imperialis'e hizmetlerinde yollarını şaşırmış olanları temizlemek için. Gerekli soruşturmaları ve tahkikatları yürütmek, maiyetindeki yerimi korumakla çatışır. Enginlik'e dönersek sancak gemisini terk edip Adeptus Arbites'teki düzeni yeniden sağlamak için çalışacağım."
